Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Sophia Gardens, Cardiff, Cardiff County, Wales, UK March contest 1st Melingriffith, 2nd Lewis Merthyr. Deportment 1st Melingriffith, 2nd Cory. 1st annual contest. 10 bands competed.
March 13, 2013, 4:36 p.m. Aug. 13, 2013, 3:01 p.m.
1 Cory Band Unknown Clive of India
2 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Unknown Liszt's Works
